title: Micropia logo font ID
content:
Anybody know the font of Micropia only logo!

[http://www.micropia.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232850/http:/www.micropia.nl/)
author: K.P.

comments.content: Under is the type: Simple, but i don't know the top one.

Better sample [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232850/http:/static.micropia.nl/static/micropia/images/micropia_en.png).  
The closest I have is [Museo Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232850/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/exljbris/museo-sans) (500) but don't think that's the one. At first sight, main difference is on /M centre vertex position.
It looks quite similar, but there are indeed some differences. Thank you anyway! What could it be?

Based on the source code and website css, the font is omnes-pro

[https://typekit.com/fonts/omnes-pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232850/https:/typekit.com/fonts/omnes-pro "https://typekit.com/fonts/omnes-pro")
I'm sorry but even if the website is using Omnes, it isn't Omnes and I really doubt it could have been based on it or at least so heavily customized it would probably better to start with Museo Sans.
I already looked at the source code, but they use it for the text not for the logo.
